meanings.sent2: Harish is a common name in India.
meanings.sent3: When Harish walked into the room, everyone greeted him warmly.
meanings.sent4: The name Harish brings to mind someone kind and friendly.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget meeting Harish at the party last night.

meanings.definition: Harish (adjective): Resembling or characteristic of a hare.
meanings.sent1: The harish creature hopped gracefully through the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The fur on the rabbit was harish and soft.
meanings.sent3: The harish bunny outsmarted the other animals in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as harish as a rabbit's coat.
meanings.sent5: The harish features of the hare made it blend perfectly into its surroundings.
